name: Radical Rappelling
summary:
Ready your rope to race down ridiculous ridges with Rip and Roxy !
Feel the rush and hold on tight as Radical Rappelling is back!
Join Rip and Roxy as you rappel down mountains at breakneck speed using your rapid reflexes.
Pull off death-defying tricks by ricocheting between launch pads, riding rainbows and rocketing over obstacles in the most ridiculous adventure ever.
Rack up coins and complete rockin’ missions to unlock sweet new gear for Rip and Roxy, the most fearless risk-takers on the planet.
It’s random. It’s ridiculous. It’s really, really rad. Play now!
